trans-unit.source: Defines a single item of the project as it is passed into a task.
trans-unit.target: 定义项目中传递到任务的单个项。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem> objects do not exactly correspond to item elements in project files.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem> 对象并不完全对应于在项目文件中的项元素。

trans-unit.source: If they did, then tasks would have access to data that was not explicitly passed into the task through the project file.
trans-unit.target: 如果已更改，任务将有权访问未显式传递到该任务通过项目文件的数据。

trans-unit.source: This is not a security issue, but rather an issue with project file clarity and transparency.
trans-unit.target: 这不是安全问题，而不是项目文件明晰度和透明度的问题。

trans-unit.source: This class has to be sealed since the build engine instantiates its own copy of this type.
trans-unit.target: 此类具有由于生成引擎会实例化此类型的副本，因此必须密封。

trans-unit.source: If a third party were to extend this class, then the build engine will yield an undesired behavior.
trans-unit.target: 如果第三方打算扩展此类，则生成引擎会产生意外的行为。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor enables this type to be COM-creatable.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数，此类型是可创建的 COM。

trans-unit.source: The item to copy.
trans-unit.target: 要复制的项。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> class using the specified source <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的源 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The item specification.
trans-unit.target: 项规范。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> class using the specified item-specification string.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的项规范字符串初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The item specification.
trans-unit.target: 项规范。

trans-unit.source: The custom metadata for the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 项规范的自定义元数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> class using the specified item-specification string and its metadata.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的项规范字符串及其元数据初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Clones the collection of custom metadata for the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 克隆项规范的自定义元数据的集合。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that represents a clone of the custom metadata.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，表示自定义元数据的克隆。

trans-unit.source: This method does not include built-in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不包括内置的元数据。

trans-unit.source: The item that this method will copy metadata to.
trans-unit.target: 此方法要将元数据复制到的项。

trans-unit.source: Copies the item-specification metadata to the specified destination task item.
trans-unit.target: 将项规范的元数据复制到指定的目标任务项。

trans-unit.source: If the metadata already exists on the destination item, then it is not overwritten.
trans-unit.target: 如果元数据已存在于目标项，然后则不覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The original metadata value supersedes the copied metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 原始的元数据值将取代复制元数据的值。

trans-unit.source: This method does not copy the item specification to the destination task item.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会复制到目标任务项的项规范。

trans-unit.source: The name of the metadata to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的元数据的名称。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: 检索项的指定元数据。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示元数据的值。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gives task items infinite lease time.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中重写时，给予任务项无限的租约时间。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="null" /> to specify an infinite lifetime.
trans-unit.target: 如果要指定无限期的生存期，则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, a limited lease of 5 minutes will result; and task instances can expire if they take a long time to process.
trans-unit.target: 否则，将导致 5 分钟的有限的租约;和任务实例可能会过期，如果它们需要较长时间来处理。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项规范。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示项规范。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem.ItemSpec%2A> for the following item declaration in a project file is `File.cs`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem.ItemSpec%2A>文件是一个项目中的以下项声明`File.cs`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of metadata set on the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取在该项上设置的元数据的数目。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that represents the count of metadata set on the item.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，表示在该项上设置的元数据的计数。

trans-unit.source: Gets the names of all the metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: 获取该项上所有元数据的名称。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" /> of metadata names.
trans-unit.target: 元数据名称的 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2" /> implementation which returns a clone of the metadata on this object.
trans-unit.target: 可返回此对象的元数据克隆的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: Values returned are in their original escaped form.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值采用其原始的转义形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the cloned metadata, with values' escaping preserved.
trans-unit.target: 返回克隆的元数据，并保留值的转义。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2" /> implementation which gets or sets the item include value.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取或设置项包含值的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: For disk-based items this would be the file path.
trans-unit.target: 对于基于磁盘的项，这将是文件路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the item include value.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含值的项。

trans-unit.source: The metadata to be queried
trans-unit.target: 要查询的元数据

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2" /> implementation which allows the values of metadata on the item to be queried.
trans-unit.target: 允许查询此项的元数据值的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: Returns the escaped metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 返回转义元数据值。

trans-unit.source: The metadata name.
trans-unit.target: 元数据名称。

trans-unit.source: The metadata value.
trans-unit.target: 元数据的值。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2" /> implementation which allows a piece of custom metadata to be set on the item.
trans-unit.target: 允许在此项上设置自定义元数据的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ITaskItem2" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: Assumes that the value passed in is unescaped, and escapes the value as necessary in order to maintain its value.
trans-unit.target: 假定传入的值未转义，并根据需要将值进行转义以维护其值。

trans-unit.source: The item to operate on.
trans-unit.target: 要操作的项。

trans-unit.source: Allows an explicit type cast from a <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> to a <see cref="T:System.String" />, and returns the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem.ItemSpec" /> for that item.
trans-unit.target: 允许从 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem" /> 显式类型转换为 <see cref="T:System.String" />，并返回该项的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem.ItemSpec" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem.ItemSpec" /> for the item.
trans-unit.target: 项的 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem.ItemSpec" />。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:Microsoft.Build.Utilities.TaskItem.ToString?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The name of metadata to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的元数据的名称。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: 移除项的指定元数据。

trans-unit.source: The name of metadata to set or modify.
trans-unit.target: 要设置或修改的元数据的名称。

trans-unit.source: The new value of metadata.
trans-unit.target: 元数据的新值。

trans-unit.source: Sets or modifies the value of the specified metadata on the item.
trans-unit.target: 设置或修改项的指定元数据的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 获取项规范。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the item specification.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.String" />，表示项规范。
